text: Prantika Das is an Indian model and actress known for her work in Bengali, Hindi, and Telugu films. She first gained recognition after winning the Dabur Gulabari GolapPari contest in 2019, which marked her entry into the entertainment industry. Since then, she has starred in several films and reality shows. == Career == Prantika started her career by winning the Dabur Gulabari GolapPari contest in 2019, which helped her establish herself as a face for the brand. She later participated in several reality shows, most notably Swayamvar Mika Di Vohti (2022), where she reached the top three finalists. She made her acting debut with the Telugu film Sadaa Nee Premalo in 2022, where she played the role of Devyani Sharma. Following this, she appeared in A Day in Winter (2022) on Hotstar as Lavannya. In 2024, she will be seen in several films, including Daroga Mamur Kirti and Tilottama. Her upcoming projects also include Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, released in November 2024. == Filmography == Filmography Year Title Role Platform/Release 2022 Sadaa Nee Premalo Devyani Sharma Amazon Prime 2022 A Day in Winter Lavannya Hotstar 2024 Daroga Mamur Kirti Lavannya 2024 Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 Noor TBA Bharga Sharmila === Upcoming projects === Title Role Expected Release Date 1954 A Murder Case (Web series) TBA === Reality shows === * Finalist in Swayamvar Mika Di Vohti (2022) * Contestant in Kiss Ishq and Konnections (2023) == References == == Other websites == Category:Indian actors Category:Indian models Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Prantika Das
